DESCRIPTION: Create or update a custom command.
INVALID: You must specify both the command and the contents: `$customcommand <command> <content>`
CREATED: You have successfully created the `{{command}}` command.
UPDATED: You have successfully updated the `{{command}}` command.
NOT_FOUND: The command `{{command}}` could not be found.
DELETED: You have successfully deleted the `{{command}}` command.
